title: The Best Twitter Reactions to President Trump's Joint Address
text:
The Best Twitter Reactions to President Trump's Joint Address Most Popular By Sally Holmes Mar 28, 2017 Tonight, President Trump is addressing congress for the first time. Here, the best reactions to the joint address on Twitter: When you're not sure whether to clap or not pic.twitter.com/gwQmBrtbZZ
